title: Regions R and S part - a

content.description: Let R be the region bounded by the graph of  y=e2x−x2 and the horizontal line y=2, and let S be the region bounded by the graph of  y=e2x−x2 and the horizontal lines y=1 and y=2, as shown above.
content.question: Find the area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
